commits.message: Put tSNE DimensionPicker in a QScrollArea

Add HDPS all-in-one CMakeLists, requested by @jeggermont

Added a CMakeList to allow building HDPS, and all plugins, within one project (one Visual Studio solution).
Requested by Jeroen (@jeggermont).

Note that on the develop branch, it does not do add_subdirectory(HDVolLoader) because HDVolLoader doesn’t exist in the develop branch, as commented by Julian Thijssen.

Merged in HdpsAllInOne (pull request #1)

Add HDPS all-in-one CMakeLists, requested by @jeggermont

Approved-by: Julian Thijssen <julianthijssen@gmail.com>

Fix SpadeAnalysisPlugin.cpp error, 'fileIndex': undeclared identifier

Removed the assert statement from `SpadeAnalysisPlugin::downsample` which caused a compilation error from the Debug configuration:

    SpadeAnalysisPlugin.cpp(368): error C2065: 'fileIndex': undeclared identifier

Was discussed last week at slack #hdps: https://biovault.slack.com/archives/CKLNDA6SY/p1561392161033300

Merged in SpadeAnalysisPlugin-error-fileIndex-undeclared-identifier (pull request #2)

Fix SpadeAnalysisPlugin.cpp error, 'fileIndex': undeclared identifier

Approved-by: Thomas Höllt <thoellt@me.com>

Fix ExampleDataPlugin bug, uninitialized local variables 'x', 'y'

Fixed a bug in `ExampleDataPlugin::setData`, detected by the following compilation warnings from VS2017:

    uninitialized local variable 'x' used
    uninitialized local variable 'y' used

Also fixed another pair of warnings, on the same lines of code:

    warning C4018: '<': signed/unsigned mismatch

Merged in ExampleDataPlugin-uninitialized-local-variables-x-y (pull request #3)

Fix ExampleDataPlugin bug, uninitialized local variables 'x', 'y'

Add override specifiers to virtual member functions

Added `override` specifiers, using clang-tidy modernize-use-override (through Visual Studio 2017 Clang Power Tools with LLVM 8.0.0):
https://clang.llvm.org/extra/clang-tidy/checks/modernize-use-override.html

The C++11 `override` specifier (introduced with Visual C++ 2005 already) improves code readability and prevents certain bugs.

Note: wherever clang-tidy has added an `override` specifier to a member function, it has also automatically removed the `virtual` keyword from that function (if it was there), as the `override` already implies that the member function is virtual.

Merged in Add-override-specifiers (pull request #5)

Add override specifiers to virtual member functions

Approved-by: Julian Thijssen <julianthijssen@gmail.com>

Fix Matrix3f::setIdentity() warning: conversion from int to float

Fixed a minor VS2017 compilation issue:

    Matrix3f.cpp(26): warning C4244: '=': conversion from 'int' to 'float', possible loss of data

    ScatterplotPlugin.cpp(176): warning C4189: 'nDim': local variable is initialized but not referenced
    ScatterplotPlugin.cpp(278): warning C4189: 'selected': local variable is initialized but not referenced

Remove unnecessary std::move calls from HDPS\src\DataManager.cpp

Applied fixes from LLVM 8.0.0 Clang-Tidy:

    message: FIX-IT applied suggested code changes
    message: remove std::move call here
    warning: moving a temporary object prevents copy elision [clang-diagnostic-pessimizing-move]

Remove redundant qualification on ScatterplotPlugin member functions

Applied automatic fixes from LLVM 8.0.0 Clang-Tidy for:

    ScatterplotSettings.h(54): warning: extra qualification on member 'setDimensions' [clang-diagnostic-microsoft-extra-qualification]
    ScatterplotSettings.h(55): warning: extra qualification on member 'setScalarDimensions' [clang-diagnostic-microsoft-extra-qualification]

Fixed bug in FcsVariable operator== and operator!=

Fixed bug reported as warning by VS2017 Code Analysis:

Code was already marked as FIXME by Julian Thijssen.

Merged in Small-compilation-fixes (pull request #6)

Fixes for various small compilation issues

Fix tSNE Analysis assert failure in TsneData::assign

Fixed a run-time assert failure from a Debug build, when doing tSNE Analysis:

    Assertion failed: inputData.size() == _numPoints * _numDimensions, file ...\pluginsystem\tsneanalysis\src\TsneData.h, line 32

Obviously, the assert was meant to check the parameters `numPoints` and `numDimensions`, not the data members (`this->_numPoints` and `this->_numDimensions`).

Merged in Fix-FcsVariable-operator== (pull request #8)

Fixed bug in FcsVariable operator== and operator!=

Fix MSVC warning: ignoring '/INCREMENTAL' due to '/LTCG' specification

The added /LTCG to CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS caused warnings from Visual C++ (Debug):

>LINK : warning LNK4075: ignoring '/INCREMENTAL' due to '/LTCG' specification
>LINK : /LTCG specified but no code generation required; remove /LTCG from the link command line to improve linker performance

This commit fixes the warning by removing the /LTCG flag.

By default, Visual Studio does not do /LTCG for a Debug configuration anyway. Moreover, the linker flag /LTCG only seems useful in combination with the compiler flag /GL.

For CMake 3.13 and higher, we may consider INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION_RELEASE:

    set_property(TARGET ${PROJECT} PROPERTY INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION_RELEASE TRUE)

See https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/merge_requests/2363

Merged in TsneData-assign-assert-failure (pull request #9)

Fix tSNE Analysis assert failure in TsneData::assign

Merged in Fix-MSVC-linker-LTCG (pull request #10)

Fix MSVC warning: ignoring '/INCREMENTAL' due to '/LTCG' specification

Fix "Error copying file" (error MSB3073) in CMake add_custom_command

When the plugin system was rebuilt multiple times, the following error could appear, from VS2017:

    Error copying file ".../pluginsystem/build/HDPS/Release/HDPS_Public.lib" to "...\HDPS_INSTALL/Release/lib/HDPS_Public.lib".
    Microsoft.CppCommon.targets(138,5): error MSB3073: The command "setlocal
    ...
    Microsoft.CppCommon.targets(138,5): error MSB3073: :VCEnd" exited with code 1.

Fixed by doing `-E copy_if_different`, instead of `-E copy`, in CMake `add_custom_command`.

Merged in CMake-copy_if_different (pull request #11)

Fix "Error copying file" (error MSB3073) in CMake add_custom_command

Points plugin api changes

Export PointsPlugin class, using __declspec(dllexport) for Windows DLL

Generated "pointsplugin_export.h" using CMake: https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.15/module/GenerateExportHeader.html

Marked PointsPlugin class `POINTSPLUGIN_EXPORT` to ensure that its member functions will be DLL-exported, even when they are implemented in its cpp file.

Linked client projects explicitly to "PointsPlugin.lib".
Automatically switch to the latest added dataset in the Scatterplot Renderer
Add Binary File (.bin) loading plugin

Feature/simplify build (#4)

* Add inter-project dependencies to get the correct build order in the monorepo

* Correct project names

* Force the build order of HDPS with respect to the other projects

* Set AUTOUIC in HDPS in to solve missing ui_MainWindow.h build error

* Add PointsPlugin dependency

* Add HDPS dependency for Example plugins

* Set path for AUTOUIC to the ui subdirectory

* add MainWindow.ui to the sources list

* FcsLoader also depends on PointsPlugin

* Add PointsPlugin dependency to ExampleView

* Add PointsPlugin dependency to the Data example plugin.

* Add PointsPlugin dependency to Clusters

* MeanShiftClustering depends on Clustering plugin

Update CMakeLists.txt

TsneAnalysPlugin was removed so delete the dependencies
Need dependencies for BinLoader for correct build
Create README.md

Redirected qDebug messages to console, to text file, and dockable view

Redirected messages from `qCritical()`, `qDebug`, `qFatal()`, and `qInfo()' to the console (stderr), a UTF-8 text file, and a dockable view.

The log file can be found via the Help menu item "Find Log File". The dockable view appears via the Help menu item "Log View".

Also added `HDPS_LOG_EXCEPTION(stdException)` macro, to be used inside `catch` clauses.
Made the log view sortable
Load plugins from disk in a dependency correct order
Fixed minor issues in plugin dependency resolution
Remove or disable extraneous output during t-SNE computation

Abstract access to point data

The access of point data must go through some interface as the data might not always be contiguous (such as with sparse data). This is a first step to removing direct access to the points data store.
Move all PointsPlugin function implementations to .cpp file
Copy the PointsPlugin.h header file when compiling PointsPlugin
Link FcsLoader with the PointsPlugin shared library
Update old TsneAnalysisPlugin to work with new PointsPlugin abstraction

Add basis settings widgets PushButton / ComboBox / HorizontalDivider

These widgets will support themes in the future and be more watertight in their stylesheets.
It will support having a more uniform look in all plugins.
Make DockableWidget class more customizable by being able to define your own layout
Use new widgets in Scatterplot Plugin

Improve performance of Logger::GetMessageRecords

Assumed that all previously retrieved message record pointers still point to existing message records, as existing message records are never deleted, and new message records are always appended to the back.

Avoid unnecessary reset of log view

Ensured that an explicit reset of the log view, "on idle", only takes place when new messages have been added.

Also reduced use of pointers.

Fix QMainWindow::saveState(): 'objectName' not set for QDockWidget

Set the name of the `LogDockWidget`, to fix Qt warnings, saying: "QMainWindow::saveState(): 'objectName' not set for QDockWidget"

Note that eventually, this issue may be fixed by inheriting from `hdps::gui::DockableWidget`, as suggested by @JulianThijssen

Replace LogItemModel::GetNumberOfColumns() by constexpr numberOfColumns

This change could improve performance, as it allows using `LogItemModel::numberOfColumns` at compile time.

Add message number to log file

Added "number" column to log file, the sequence number of the message (based on order of appearance).

Add context menu to log view, having Copy menu item

Allows copying a row from the log view, by context menu item "Copy".

Note: Ctrl+C is also supported, by default, but it only copies a single cell, and it only supports copying text (no numeric values).

Write message type to log file as string ("info", "debug", etc.)

Writes more user-friendly string representation of message type to log file.

Uses the same string representation as in the log view.

Define QT_MESSAGELOGCONTEXT also for release builds

Allows additional information about log messages from QMessageLogContext, also in release builds.

As specified at https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qmessagelogcontext.html:
"By default, this information is recorded only in debug builds. You can overwrite this explicitly by defining QT_MESSAGELOGCONTEXT"
